name: Liquid Designs: Kyle Kraiter's Art Glass Studio
blurb: I am an independent glass artist ready to take my art to the next level by building a custom designed glassblowing studio.

name: Heirloom Chimes
blurb: Handmade stained glass chimes with a unique flair made to last a lifetime

name: Art Glass Visions - Roses for Valentine's Day Gifts
blurb: Surprise your sweetie with roses that won't wilt on her desk or make her fat, and instead remind her everyday of how much you love her.

name: handmade vases. made of Murano Glass. Jeanne Koepp. Berlin
blurb: old tradition of hand made glass vases, made of Murano Glass               designed by Jeanne Koepp, limited, numbered, signed

name: Blown Glass Easter Egg Hunt
blurb: Last year our glass art studio put on a free Easter egg hunt for the community - help us make it even better this year!
